headline.main: Kansas' Mason, Nova's Hart Leading Player of the Year Races
headline.print_headline: Kansas' Mason, Nova's Hart Leading Player of the Year Races

lead_paragraph: The race for the major player of the year awards in college basketball was a split decision in 2016. Oklahoma's Buddy Hield won the Naismith and Wooden awards, while Michigan State's Denzel Valentine was The Associated Press player of the year.
snippet: The race for the major player of the year awards in college basketball was a split decision in 2016. Oklahoma's Buddy Hield won the Naismith and Wooden awards, while Michigan State's Denzel Valentine was The Associated Press player of the year....
